item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.author: grv.rkg@gmail.com (Kumar Gaurav)
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Who is Kumar?
item.author: grv.rkg@gmail.com (Kumar Gaurav)
item.description: Hello, My name is Kumar Gaurav and I’m an app, innovation & devops expert. Looking for an Cloud Solutions Architect with some scrapes & bruises? I’ve worked with startups for almost a decade in the Publishing, AdTech, Edtech, eSports & Fashion industries. A bit about me… While studying Computer Science, I was building servers in my hostel. Writing C, C++ & shell scripts were your essential toolbox to getting things to work!
